mapper.select: select Id organization_id, ParentId organization_parentId, ParentName organization_parentName, Type organization_type, Code organization_code, Name organization_name, ShortName organization_shortName, Phone organization_phone, Fax organization_fax, PostCode organization_postCode, Address organization_address, Description organization_description, Status organization_status, TreeLevel organization_treeLevel, TreePath organization_treePath, IsChildNode organization_isChildNode, CreateTime organization_createTime, ModifyTime organization_modifyTime, RoleIds organization_roleIds from UC_Organization

select Id organization_id, ParentId organization_parentId, ParentName organization_parentName, Type organization_type, Code organization_code, Name organization_name, ShortName organization_shortName, Phone organization_phone, Fax organization_fax, PostCode organization_postCode, Address organization_address, Description organization_description, Status organization_status, TreeLevel organization_treeLevel, TreePath organization_treePath, IsChildNode organization_isChildNode, CreateTime organization_createTime, ModifyTime organization_modifyTime, RoleIds organization_roleIds from UC_Organization where Id=${id}

select Id organization_id, ParentId organization_parentId, ParentName organization_parentName, Type organization_type, Code organization_code, Name organization_name, ShortName organization_shortName, Phone organization_phone, Fax organization_fax, PostCode organization_postCode, Address organization_address, Description organization_description, Status organization_status, TreeLevel organization_treeLevel, TreePath organization_treePath, IsChildNode organization_isChildNode, CreateTime organization_createTime, ModifyTime organization_modifyTime, RoleIds organization_roleIds from UC_Organization order by Id asc limit ${start},${offset}
